name: PlatformPanic
description:
PlatformPanic

The floor is lava! The platforms are shrinking! Panic!

Controls: WASD for movement; Space to Jump; R to restart

This is a game created for onehourgamejam #1hgj Nr. 112 (Theme: "The Floor Is Lava") on 17th June 2017.
A minor update was released to fix some bugs on 18th June 2017.

The sound-effects were made with ChipTone, the game itself was made in Unity 5.6.1f1.
